attributes.additional_details: FOR TO LONG NOW WE HAVE PAMPERED TO THE NEEDS? OF POEPLE WHO CLAIM ALL OR ANY BENIFIT AVAILABLE INCLUDING THOSE WHO ENTER THE COUNTRY FOR ECOMOMIC REASONS OUR COUNTRY LIKE MANY IN TODAYS TOUBLED FINANCIAL TIMES CAN NOT AND SHOULD NOT SUSTAIN SHUCH OPEN AND ABUSED SYSTEMS.THE PROPOSAL IS THAT ANY CLAIMANT FOR ANY BENIFIT SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST PAID INTO THE SYSTEM FOR A QUALIYFING PERIOD OF TWELVE MONTHS AND SHOULD ONLY BE ALLOWEED TO CLAIM FOR A CORESEPONDING AMOUNT OF TIME SO THAT PAYMENT IN IS EQUAL TO PAYMENT OUT IN QUALIFYING YEARS IT WOULD BE POSSIBLE TO TRANSFER ACURRED TIME FROM FAMILY MEMBER TO FAMILY MEMBER USING THE ACCOUNT OF THE HIGHEST AMOUNT OF ACCURED TIME UNTYIL THAT ACCOUNT HAD BEEN EXHAUTED OR THE CLAIMANT HAD PAID INTO THE SYSTEM ENOUGH TO CL;AIM FOR THEMSELVES. IT IS ALSO PROPOSED THAT A VOUCHER SYSTEM BE INTORDUCED AND THAST MONEY BE REPLACED WITH A GOVERMENT CREDIT CARD WHICH WAS ONLY REDEMABLE FGOR THE PAYMENT OF NECCESSITIES
